channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver (Internet Communication Manager)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP NetWeaver (Internet Communication Manager)

item.title: CVE-2022-28772|2024-08-03T06:03:52.584Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20%28internet%20communication%20manager%29
item.description: By overlong input values an attacker may force overwrite of the internal program stack in SAP Web Dispatcher - versions 7.53, 7.77, 7.81, 7.85, 7.86, or Internet Communication Manager - versions KRNL64NUC 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, KRNL64UC 7.22, 7.22EXT, 7.49, 7.53, KERNEL 7.22, 7.49, 7.53, 7.77, 7.81, 7.85, 7.86, which makes these programs unavailable, leading to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-28773|2024-08-03T06:03:52.639Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20netweaver%20%28internet%20communication%20manager%29
item.description: Due to an uncontrolled recursion in SAP Web Dispatcher and SAP Internet Communication Manager, the application may crash, leading to denial of service, but can be restarted automatically.
